Message: Hey Mom, can we make some cookies later? I really want to try making the chocolate chip ones like we saw on that cooking show! It looked so fun, and I bet they'll taste super yummy. Can we, can we please?
You can make some if you want. Just clean up after.
Okay, Mom! I'll make sure to clean everything up when I'm done. Can I make cookies, please? I'll even save some for you!
Yeah, sure, go ahead. Just remember to clean up.
Okay, thanks, Mom! I'll make sure everything is cleaned up when I'm done. I'm going to build the tallest Lego tower ever! Can you help me find the big green baseplate? I think it's under the couch.
Check if it's there. If not, it might be somewhere in your room.
Oh, okay, Mom! I'll go look in my room again. Maybe it's under the bed or in the closet. I'll check everywhere!
Alright, let me know if you find it.
Okay, Mom! I'll look for it everywhere, and if I find it, I'll tell you right away!
Okay, mom! So, can we go to the park later? I really want to try out my new soccer ball with you!
Sure, you can go to the park. Have fun with your soccer ball.
